page.title: 12TOURISM-PORTPATRICK CONTD.
page.content: The highlight of the summer season is{Lifeboat Week,}the first week of August, when members of the lifeboat crew, members of the R.N.L.I. Branch Committee and supporters provide entertainment which raises much needed funds for the Institute.Details of the 1985 programme are given on the following page. The present season has been very poor to date, perhaps due to the wettest July in many years, yet reflecting a steady decline over the past decade thought to be due to a combination of economic recession, ever-increasing petrol costs and the trend towards more Britons taking package holidays abroad.
